subproject.description: Ssupport Serbia in achieving the necessary standards and decreasing the levels of corruption as required under UNCAC and for EU accessionAt national level, this includes the development of whistleblower protection mechanisms, by supporting the recently established Serbian Anti-corruption Agency (ACA) in the development and enactment of the required regulations.

subproject.title: ACA Corruption Prevention

subproject.description: The project is aimed at supporting Serbia in achieving the necessary standards and decreasing the levels of corruption as required under UNCAC and for EU accession. At local level, the establishment of efficient mechanisms for combating corruption includes the piloting of the concept of citizens’ charters, which are codes of conduct for municipal authorities, and setting up an index for measuring accountability and transparency at sub-national level, drawing on innovative comparative experience in the region.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality

title: AC Support to Serbian Gov't combating corruption
